channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Construction firm Italian-Thai Development is under fire after consecutive crane collapses
item.description: Italian-Thai Development, No. 174 on the Southeast Asia 500, is also linked to last year's collapse of a partially-built skyscraper in Bangkok.

item.title: A Difficult Client Will Only Deal With One of My Employees

item.title: I’ve Coached Hundreds of Leaders. Here’s What the Best Do Differently to Kill Burnout and Boost Well-Being
item.description: Addressing burnout must be part of every leadership strategy in 2026.

item.title: Lyft CEO: ‘Let’s stop doing that, please’
item.description: With a sharp focus on customer service, Lyft CEO David Risher is writing the ridesharing company’s comeback story.

item.title: How to Help Your Employees Who May Have Caregiving Duties for Kids or Parents
item.description: Small businesses can sometimes feel like families—but data show that right now many workers’ actual families are demanding more care.

item.title: Science (and Jeff Bezos) Says Great Leaders Always Speak Last
